article_title: Meadville Medical Center announces Voluntary Early Retirement Incentive Program for qualifying employees
article_text:
Meadville, PA (16335)

Today

Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 81F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 64F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: Meadville Tribune

og.description: Meadville Medical Center announced on Tuesday a Voluntary Early Retirement Incentive Program for qualifying employees who meet age and years of service requirements.
